DOC.brief_summary: Psychosocial stress increase risk multitude disease , include obesity , hypertension , cardiovascular disease . Stress may also result increased utilization health care service . In workplace , stress lead emotional exhaustion , job dissatisfaction , low productivity impaired performance . Stress management program base mindfulness meditation gain popularity recent year . The purpose study evaluate feasibility 8-week web-based mindfulness stress reduction program effectiveness reduce work related stress improve well-being large corporate call center .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Free Now Corporate Call Center
DOC.criteria: Frontline employee large corporate call center Internet access Manager supervisor large corporate call center
